name: User can see the detail page of each product -- @1.5

steps.name: Given I am logged in as a user with username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce"
When I visit the inventory page
And I click on the product with name "Sauce Labs Onesie"

Then I should see the detail page of the product wit all its content and the correct product name "Sauce Labs Onesie", "$7.99", "Rib snap infant onesie for the junior automation engineer in development. Reinforced 3-snap bottom closure, two-needle hemmed sleeved and bottom won't unravel."

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: Rib snap infant onesie for the junior automation engineer in development. Reinforced 3-snap bottom closure, two-needle hemmed sleeved and bottom won't unravel.

fullName: Detail page functionallity test: User can see the detail page of each product
